titleStmt.title: R. M. Corwine to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2208

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: We, the, undersigned, respectfully recommend William H. Mackoy, Attorney at Law Cincinnati Ohio, for appointment as Commissioner of Deeds of Kentucky to act within and for the State of Ohio. The applicant has a general knowledge of the laws applicable to the functions of the office, possesses the intelligence and learning necessary to the correct application of them, and has such habits of business as will afford a sufficient quaranty that the duties of his office will be well performed.

M. J. Dudley
Atty at Law
Covington Ky

R M Corwine
U. S. Dis Atty South D. O.
Corwine & Walker
Attys at Law
Thos A Logan

Comr of Deeds
Ohio
W. H. Mackoy
comd
2d Sept 1865
